name: Marinara Dipping Sauce
description: This is the ‘How you marinara-ing' moment your food has been waiting for! Just like Joey’s love for pizza, this sauce pairs perfectly with everything – from Mozzarella Sticks, Quick Air Fryer Fries, to Chicken Strips. Friends don’t let friends eat without marinara, so grab a spoon and let the dipping marathon begin!
preparation: Combine ingredients in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup and simmer over medium heat for 20 minutes.

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavor of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.
